snippet: The shooting, the second in a month, was the latest demonstration of the growing American involvement in counternarcotics operations in the country.
abstract: Two United States Drug Enforcement Administration agents shoot and kill suspected drug trafficker in Honduras; shooting, the second in a month, is the latest demonstration of the growing American involvement in counternarcotics operations in the country.

byline.original: By CHARLIE SAVAGE and THOM SHANKER

lead_paragraph: The shooting, the second in a month, was the latest demonstration of the growing American involvement in counternarcotics operations in the country.

headline.seo: D.E.A. Agents Kill Smuggling Suspect in Honduras
headline.main: Drug Smuggling Suspect Killed by D.E.A. Agents in Honduras
headline.print_headline: Drug Smuggling Suspect Killed By D.E.A. Agents in Honduras
